Show / Hide Table of Contents

Class VariableProblemExtensions

Implements various extension methods for Problem that are related to Variables. Also implements a couple of extensions on solutions, when they make the most sense to include here.

Fill in the fields of target with the values of the variables and propositions with the same name, from a new solution to the specified problem.
